Generation IX.Scarlet: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit . It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.
Generation IX.Violet: The envy accumulated within curved beads that sparked multiple conflicts has clad itself in fire and become a Pokémon.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Firescourge Shrine ( Only one )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Firescourge Shrine ( Only one )
